Ancestry-Tripkee -- Male Windweb Tripkee Fighter
Strength: +2 Dexterity: +1 Constitution: +1 Intelligence: +1 Wisdom: +2 Charisma: +2
Background: Criminal Deity: Nethys
Experience: 774/1000 Level: 1 Speed: 15 Size: Small Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 7/12
Attribute Notes:
Armor Speed Penalty: -10 Speed
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Jungle Strider: Moves normally through difficult terrain in forests and jungles
Prodigious Climber: Has a 20' climb Speed
Riverside Tripkee: Has a 15' swim Speed
Tripkee Glide: (1) Can glide 5' down and up to 25' forward each rd with a hand free
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Class: 1; General: 0 Selectable Feature Count: Fighter (Key Attribute); Tripkee (Heritage)
Feats: Absorb Toxin; Croak Talker; Double Slice; Envenomed Edge; Fantastic Leaps; Hop Up; Hunter's Defense; Jungle Strider; Long Tongue; Moisture Bath; Nocturnal Tripkee; Prodigious Climber; Ricocheting Leap; Tenacious Net; Terrifying Croak; Tongue Tether; Tripkee Glide; Tripkee Lore; Tripkee Weapon Familiarity; Unbound Leaper; Vomit Stomach Fighter Features: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Attack Trained (Advanced Weapons); Attribute Boost (Strength); Attribute Boosts; Class Trained (Fighter); Defense Trained (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense); Fighter Feats; Fighter Key Attribute; Fighter Skills; Perception Expert; Reactive Strike; Save Expert (Fortitude; Reflex); Save Trained (Will); Shield Block; Strength Criminal Features: Attribute Boost (Choose 1 from Dexterity, Intelligence; Choose 1 from any); Experienced Smuggler; Skill Trained (Stealth; Underworld Lore) Tripkee Features: Attribute Boost (Dexterity; Wisdom; Choose 1 from any); Attribute Flaw (Strength); Low-Light Vision; Natural Climber; Poisonhide Tripkee; Riverside Tripkee; Small; Snaptongue Tripkee; Stickytoe Tripkee; Thickskin Tripkee; Tripkee Heritage; Windweb Tripkee
Feature Notes:
Fighter Feats: 1 selections
Fighter Key Attribute: 1 selection
Nocturnal Tripkee: Has the Darkvision feature
Poisonhide Tripkee: Has the Toxic Skin feature
Tripkee Heritage: 1 selection
Tripkee Lore: Has the Additional Lore (Tripkee Lore) feature
Darkvision: Has normal b/w vision in darkness and dim light
Hunter's Defense: (R) Can use Nature DC instead of Armor Class vs. a nature creature once per hr
Long Tongue: Gives +5' reach using tongue
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Snaptongue Tripkee: Can use tongue to deliver touch spells and to perform simple Interact actions
Perception: +7 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +1 (dexterity; trained) Hag Lore: +4 (intelligence; trained) Society: +1 (intelligence; untrained)
Arcana: +1 (intelligence; untrained) Intimidation: +5 (charisma; trained) Stabling Lore: +4 (intelligence; trained)
Athletics: -1 (strength; untrained) Medicine: +2 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +1 (dexterity; trained)
Butchering Lore: +4 (intelligence; trained) Nature: +5 (wisdom; trained) Survival: +2 (wisdom; untrained)
Crafting: +1 (intelligence; untrained) Occultism: +1 (intelligence; untrained) Thievery: -2 (dexterity; untrained)
Deception: +2 (charisma; untrained) Performance: +2 (charisma; untrained) Tripkee Lore: +4 (intelligence; trained)
Diplomacy: +2 (charisma; untrained) Religion: +2 (wisdom; untrained) Underworld Lore: +4 (intelligence; trained)
Languages: Common; Sussuran; Tripkee
Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Tripkee Lore): Skill Trained (Tripkee Lore)
Armor Skill Penalty: -3 strength and dexterity skills
Fighter Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Acrobatics, Athletics; Choose 4 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +1 Language Count
Tripkee Lore: Skill Trained (Nature; Stealth)
Croak Talker: Can converse with amphibians
Experienced Smuggler: Automatically gets at least 10 on Stealth rolls to conceal a small item
Fantastic Leaps: Gives +5' vertical and +10' horizontal Leap distance
Jungle Strider: Does not suffer off-guard when Balancing on narrow surfaces or uneven ground made of plants, and successes to do so are critical successes
Natural Climber: +2 Athletics to Climb
Ricocheting Leap: Can use Wall Jump to carom off creatures that are larger than self and to Shove or Trip a creature once per turn
Stickytoe Tripkee: Successes on Athletics to Climb foliage are critical successes
Tenacious Net: Nets require a successful DC 18 to Escape, and a successful Escape leaves the target off-guard until the start of their next turn
Unbound Leaper: Can Leap 30' in any direction
Combat
Hit Points: 19 Armor Class: 19 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 15 (strength; trained)
Armor: Splint Mail Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12) Weapons: Crossbow (+6 1d8 P R120'; dexterity; expert); Falchion (+7 1d10+2 S; strength; expert); Mace (+7 1d6+2 B; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Thickskin Tripkee: +2 Hit Points
Tripkee Weapon Familiarity: Weapon Familiarity (Tripkee Weapons; Blowgun; Dart; Hatchet; Scythe; Shortbow)
Double Slice: (2) Makes simultaneous Strikes with 2 melee weapons at the current multiple attack penalty; a non-agile weapon on the second Strike suffers -2 attack
Envenomed Edge: Critical hits that inflict slashing or piercing damage also inflict 1d4 HP persistent poison
Hop Up: (F) Stands without triggering reactions when regaining consciousness
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Stickytoe Tripkee: +2 Fortitude and Reflex DC vs. Disarm, Shove, Reposition, and Trip attempts
Terrifying Croak: (1) R30' Demoralize attempt suffers no penalty for lacking a shared language; success prevents reducing the target's frightened condition below 1 for 1 rd
Tongue Tether: Can use tongue to Disarm, Grab An Edge, Reposition, and Trip
Toxic Skin: (R) Inflicts 1d4 HP poison on triggering touch (save basic Fortitude) once per hr
Tripkee Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon tripkee weapons
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +6 (dexterity; expert); Will: +5 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Absorb Toxin: (R) Successful counteract check ends the effects on others of an area disease or poison affect; requires a successful -2 save to avoid the effects on self
Moisture Bath: (1) Successful DC 10 flat check ends persistent fire and cold damage and gives fire and cold resistance 0 for 1 min once per day
Thickskin Tripkee: +1 vs. disease and poison
Vomit Stomach: (R) Reduces a sickened condition by 2 and gives a +2 save vs. recently-ingested poisons, leaving self off-guard for 1 rd, once per day
Windweb Tripkee: Takes no damage from falling with a hand free
